mission: We invite visitors to slow down, listen, and walk deliberately across the Bruce Peninsula while honoring the land as teacher and host.
governance: A collective of local stewards, knowledge keepers, and conservation partners oversee Nokomis Trail programming and uphold ethical tourism standards.
partners: We work with Saugeen Ojibway Nation advisors, regional conservation authorities, and small hospitality partners committed to respectful tourism.
acknowledgements: With gratitude to the stewards of the Bruce Peninsula, past and present, whose care makes this place possible.

stakeholders.name: Municipality
stakeholders.role: Supports visitor flow and local infrastructure.

stakeholders.name: Local Tourism Businesses
stakeholders.role: Offer SON-led experiences and hospitality support.

stakeholders.name: Visitors & Tourists
stakeholders.role: Engage respectfully and gain meaningful learning experience.
